data.name: ExBtCodUnknownFormat
data.value: Unknown format for class of device information.

data.name: ExBtInvalidLength
data.value: Encoded Bluetooth OOB data length does not match payload length.

data.name: ExBtInvalidLengthSimplePairingHashC
data.value: Invalid length of the simple pairing hash C (should be 16 octets).

data.name: ExBtInvalidLengthSimplePairingRandomizerR
data.value: Invalid length of the simple pairing randomizer R (should be 16 octets).

data.name: ExBtInvalidMinimumLength
data.value: OOB data does not reach minumum length of 8 bytes.

data.name: ExBtNoDeviceAddress
data.value: Bluetooth Device address must be defined.

data.name: ExBtNoValidHexAddress
data.value: No valid Bluetooth address in hexadecimal format.

data.name: ExBtNoValidServiceClassId
data.value: No valid Bluetooth Service Class ID.

data.name: ExBtNoValidServiceClassLength
data.value: Bluetooth Service Class Length invalid.

data.name: ExGeoNoHereMapsAppId
data.value: HERE Maps URI schemes require an AppId.

data.name: ExHandoverAcCarrierNoData
data.value: No Carrier Data Reference present in Handover Select / Alternative Carrier record.

data.name: ExHandoverDataReferenceTooLong
data.value: Data Reference is too long - use the record ID in max 255 characters.

data.name: ExHandoverDataTooManyAuxiliaryReferences
data.value: Too many auxiliary data references - use max 255 data references.

data.name: ExHandoverErrorInvalidData
data.value: Invalid error data.

data.name: ExHandoverErrorInvalidSourceData
data.value: Can not create Handover Error record based on the provided source data.

data.name: ExHandoverErrorNoData
data.value: No error data present.

data.name: ExHandoverErrorNoReason
data.value: No error reason present.

data.name: ExHandoverErrorUnknownReason
data.value: Unknown error reason.

data.name: ExHandoverInvalidVersion
data.value: Handover version must be one byte, containing major and minor fields.

data.name: ExHandoverNoCarrierDataReference
data.value: The Alternative Carrier record needs to define a carrier data reference.

data.name: ExHandoverSelectMsgInvalidRecords
data.value: Can not create Handover Select message - found illegal record.

data.name: ExIcalendarNoCalendarFound
data.value: No calendar data found in the supplied calendar data.

data.name: ExIcalendarNoEventFound
data.value: The supplied calendar information does not contain a valid event / appointment.

data.name: ExInvalidCopy
data.value: Attempted to instantiate new record from incompatible record.

data.name: ExLaunchAppArgumentsEmpty
data.value: Arguments for LaunchApp must not be empty.

data.name: ExLaunchAppPlatformLength
data.value: Unable to assemble LaunchApp payload: length of platform / AppID tuple more than 255 characters.

data.name: ExLaunchAppPlatformMissing
data.value: Unable to assemble LaunchApp payload: at least one platform / AppID tuple is required.

data.name: ExLaunchAppPlatformsEmpty
data.value: At least one platform / app ID tuple needs to be defined.

data.name: ExLaunchAppWpId
data.value: For a Windows Phone platform ID, please supply the 36 character product ID containing only hexadecimal characters and '-'.

data.name: ExMailtoAddressEmpty
data.value: Recipient address must not be empty.

data.name: ExMailtoAddressNotValid
data.value: The recipient address does not appear to be valid.

data.name: ExMessageBeginLate
data.value: Ndef parse error: Message Begin flag present after first record.

data.name: ExMessageBeginMissing
data.value: Ndef parse error: Expected Message Begin missing in first record.

data.name: ExMessageEndLate
data.value: Ndef parse error: Message End flag present after last record.

data.name: ExMessageInvalidChunkedId
data.value: Ndef parse error: Invalid chunked data, Id Length != 0.

data.name: ExMessageInvalidChunkedType
data.value: Ndef parse error: Invalid chunked data, Type Length != 0.

data.name: ExMessageNoBeginOrEnd
data.value: Ndef parse error: Malformed NDEF Message, missing begin or end.

data.name: ExMessagePartialChunk
data.value: Ndef parse error: Partial chunk not empty or typeNameFormat not 0x06 as expected.

data.name: ExMessageUnexpectedEnd
data.value: Ndef parse error: Unexpected end of message.

data.name: ExNearSpeakLanguageWrongLength
data.value: Language code must be 5 characters.

data.name: ExNearSpeakNoCloudId
data.value: Online ID must be set.

data.name: ExNearSpeakNoLanguage
data.value: Language code must be defined.

data.name: ExNearSpeakNoText
data.value: Text to speak must not be empty.

data.name: ExNearSpeakNoValidType
data.value: No valid NearSpeak type identifier.

data.name: ExNokiaAccessoriesProductEmpty
data.value: ProductName for Nokia Accessories record must not be empty.

data.name: ExNokiaAccessoriesSerialEmpty
data.value: Serial number for Nokia Accessories must not be empty.

data.name: ExNokiaAccessoriesSerialFormat
data.value: Serial number must be 19 chars, decimal numbers only.

data.name: ExRawUriNoAbbreviation
data.value: The raw URI can only be retrieved if the URI is not abbreviated by the record.

data.name: ExRecordEmptyWithTypeOrPayload
data.value: The Empty record must not have a payload or a type.

data.name: ExRecordNoType
data.value: No Type set for record.

data.name: ExRecordUnchangedId
data.value: Id must not be set for middle or terminating record (TNF = Unchanged).

data.name: ExRecordUnchangedTypeName
data.value: Record with TNF Unchanged must have an empty type name.

data.name: ExSmsBodyEmpty
data.value: Body text for SMS record must not be empty.

data.name: ExSmsNumberEmpty
data.value: Number for SMS record must not be empty.

data.name: ExSocialNoUser
data.value: Social user name must not be empty.

data.name: ExSpUriEmpty
data.value: Uri of Smart Poster ust not be empty.

data.name: ExTelNumberEmpty
data.value: Number for telephone record must not be empty.
